message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $125?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $135. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $132.50?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $130?
I'm getting close to your offer, Bob! I can do $131.50, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm really close, but I think I can do $130.50. Would you be willing to meet me there?
